title: Episode 163: The Smell Lingers (Feat. Pleasure P)
itunes:title: Episode 163: The Smell Lingers (Feat. Pleasure P)
description:
Singer/songwriter Pleasure P joins the ladies of Lip Service this week and unpacks his emotional Instagram posts, explains why he'll never get married, why men love hoes, and much more! Pleasure P even shares an anal sex horror story... Shout out to Tara Wallace for guest hosting!
